review:
Gameplay:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0x80WjCbMK0

Subsiege ist 2018 im Early Access auf Steam erschienen und wurde nie wirklich weiter entwickelt. 
Warum so ein Indie Arcade RTS 20Euro kostet erschließt sich mir nicht.
Das Spiel ist meiner Meinung nach, vor allem in dem Zustand, 5 Euro wert. 
Wenn ihr es im Angebot findet dann guckt mal rein, aber für den OVP Preis kann ich es nicht empfehlen.

review:
True, I bought this game like last year or something, only to find out this morning: IT IS DEAD!

Oh Steam, my good buddies, I would like you to refund my money now and remove this game from store listings. Isn't posting unplayable games against your ToS or something? 

If not, then man...  I know how to make same quick cash the next time I suffer a real ugly relapse. WOOT W00T! I'll be just like the Subsiege Dev and treat everyone I deceive out of money as though they were nothing more than a bunch of stupid rubes!

Clearly, the developer appears to feel this way or he would do away with this. STEAM, friend, do you feel this way? Not refunding someone for an unplayable game would pretty much assure that was indeed how you felt, but if you're reading this, I want you to know: I THINK BETTER OF YOU.... for now. ;)

Please don't make me go over to Epic. J/K, I'd go over to GOG ...you can't do this and be a reputable business. This is true for the developer too. WTF did you die or something? The excuse better be a good one, I think we can all agree.

But seriously, I want my money back now. The game is unplayable. It should have LOOOOONG SINCE been removed.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991219113', 'num_games_owned': 393, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1551013342}

Wir haben schon EA die das gerne machen oder MS damals mit Freelancer wir sind schon gut bedient, von solche Luftpumpen brauchen wir nicht noch mehr. Schon schlimm genug das dieses Spiel nur in English ist programmiert von einer Deutschen Firma. Ich kann gar nicht so viel Essen wie ich Kotzen könnte über das Game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059857237', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1537766738}
review:
I expected to be able to play the game just like a tiberian sun game with AI, but instead i was met with an "average" of 3 minutes to find a game. as far as i can tell it's a multiplayer only game. shame steam won't let me have a refund.
I like the mechanics but i think there should be a skirmish mode, where you can add bots. until then i can't recommend this game because there is such a small player base that it takes too long to find a game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013755716', 'num_games_owned': 423, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1537740047}
review:
Немного напомнила submarine titans и tryst. Игра на скорость и время. Кораблики выживают хорошо, постоянно надо следить за уровнем кислорода, оный добывается из трупов вражеских корабликов и криттеров (привет, warcraft 3). Покупки делаются за кристаллы и зелёный газ (привет, starcraft). Авторы явно нацелены на мультиплеер. Не уверен, что взлетит. Вглавном меню две бабы, одна похожая на сарукэрриган, вторая на кого-то из overwatch. Обучение крайне назойливое и раздражающее (угон экрана, постоянные напоминания). Приближать и отдалять камеру нельзя.
Поиграть удалось недолго, если что неверно - пишите.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042702462', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1537643757}
review: Pretty decent game. Would be a blast with some friends. However in this Genre of game I will never buy it. Any MOBA type game should be free to play with in game purchaes to support the developer. Games like LOL, Dota and HoS have made millions with the F2P model. Making this a game you have to buy will hinder getting good player support which is needed for a multipleyr game to survive. So note to developers: Make this a F2P game and work on advertising to get a good player base. If you dont do that chances are high that this game will be dead and fail in 6 mnonths or less.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972413713', 'num_games_owned': 552, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1534021168}
review:
Sorry but this game is dead and not even playable any more!

The game is only player vs player, but not a single person is on to play with.
There it no option to play Ai so we cannot even play by our selves.

This makes your game impossible to even play = WE CANNOT PLAY A SINGLE GAME!

The graphics look fine

OTHER PROBLEMS
The web pages on the main menu page no longer load
we cannot group units to number keys

VERDICT
The game only being PvP does not work! and you need to AT LEAST put in Ai so we can play the game solo.
I know you have put time and money into this project, and you have left this game up on sale to try to get some money back, but anyone buying this game will instantly refund it to get their money back. Trying to sell a game that noone can play only damaging your reputation.

Add Ai or cut your losses and good luck in the future, but this game should not be on sale anymore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074052794', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1519763005}
review:
Voy a comentar teniendo en cuenta que todavía se encuentra en fase beta... verde, muy verde.
Tiene cosas muy chulas, pero también muchos puntos negativos.

POSITIVO:
- Gráficos buenos y comandos sencillos.
- Interfaz pulida, simple de visualizar y gestionar con accesos rápidos de teclado, ya preconfigurados.
- Tiene opción para crear y unirse a servidores online, aunque no hay ni dios.

NEGATIVO:
- No tiene modo campaña, o partida personalizable que no sea online, aparte del tutorial.
- El juego en sí es cutre: creas tropas, y muevete super rapido a recolectar los dos unicos recursos que necesitas y a matar bichos.
- Tiene oxígeno en las naves. Si llega a 0, KO. La unica forma de obtenerlo es matando bichos (naves piratas).
- No puedes construir una base como tal. Simplemente crear tropas y mejorar sus habilidades.

Por lo que me ha parecido, el resumen de este juego es: "Crear tropas, recolectar lo justo, crear mas tropas, y matar bichos".

Esperaba recibir la esencia del increíble Submarine Titans, una versión mejorada de gráficos e interfaz. Pero no, se queda muy por debajo del subsuelo.

De momento no lo recomiendo para nada. Esperemos dentro de un año, o dos, o tres que mejore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056964829', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1506503898}
review:
Having problems running the game, I'm assuming it's a graphics issue, but even dropping all settings to lowest doesn't help.  Also it has crashed every time I've tried playing (not sure if issues are related), haven't even been able to finish tutorial because of this.  Contacted support two weeks ago but haven't heard back from them yet.

Seems like a decent concept, but haven't been able to play enough to find out.  If they ever get back to me or I can fix it on my own, and they add VS AI mode, I'll probably change this to a recommend, but until then, I just can't.  I should probably get a refund, but I'm starved for RTS and I got it on sale ::shrug::

author: {'steamid': '76561198112092701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1501947569}
review:
Чёт как-то слабенько. Игре не стоит своих денег даже с хорошей скидкой. Простая анимация движений лодок, хотя окружение выглядит вполне достойно.
Вроде бы тактическая боёвка, но на развитие и фарм тупо не хватает времени из-за постоянной нехватки кислорода. Т.е. матчи очень быстрые по 3-5 минут.
Карта всего одна.
Мне совершенно не понравилась.

author: {'steamid': '76561198326778768', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1496062740}
review: 游戏的优化实在不行，我的电脑配置绝对满足，但开这游戏的时候还是有些掉帧，虽然不是很严重，但也很影响游戏体验。其次，游戏的镜头平移速度是固定的，而且太慢，影响战斗时的操作。然后游戏没有编队系统。最后说一句，这游戏里面的战舰太耐操了，远比星际里面的单位耐操。。

author: {'steamid': '76561197969643654', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1495977842}
review:
I bought Subsiege on 67% sale during early access. This game has potential, but it's not ready by long shot.

Pros:

* Graphics
* Particle effects
* Frame rate (well optimized)
* Original play-style
* Sound (for the most part, one sub sounds just like Beemo)

Cons:

* Recommends playing tutorial even after it was completed.
* No single player, not even skirmish against A.I.
* No servers/active-players in my region.
* Cheap text to speech voices that do not match the text in the dialogs.
* Tutorial help is unaligned on ultrawide screens

Conclusion:

I think I would enjoy this game if other people in my region played this game or if there was single player skirmish support at the very least. If players had the ablity to practice without waiting for other people to join your lobby. The game might become popular and improve the multiplayer experience. It would seem that the developers are focusing on league support during early access, which seems a bit backwards to me.

PS: Funny issue, game asks for a CD when I try to launch it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135440984', 'num_games_owned': 299, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1495601629}

author: {'steamid': '76561197972082421', 'num_games_owned': 300, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1490217643}
review:
Though still in development I really like this game. In contrast to many other strategy games, your goal is not to build and expand, but survive, while struggeling with permanently depleting oxygen, few resources and aggressive other players. You can controll up to 6 submarines, each with their own advantages and disadvantages. Every submarine class has their own unique ability, so you should build your fleet with care.

Overall already in early-access a great game, that plays really different to both most RTS and MOBAS while containing elements of both.

author: {'steamid': '76561198281250768', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1490576488}
review: http://www.playsomevideogames.com/subsiege-initial-impressions/

author: {'steamid': '76561197984298432', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1490481380}
review: Overall a good game, but there were a few things that I took issue with.  What I enjoy the most out of RTS games in the base building mechanic and to sit back and build up before I take a big army to my enemy and hit them in full force.  There is a mechanic of this game called the Oxygen timer which forces you to attack the enemy early and often to replenish your oxygen.  This was annoying to me.  The game also seems a little overpriced for what you get at the moment.  It is a very polished game thus far, but I would've appreciate a single player campaign instead of a purely multiplayer experience.  So far the community in this game is small and finding multiplayer matches is hard, so I would've priced it a little less than the current $30.  If you enjoy RTS games, and are looking for a new and interesting take on them, this may be the game for you.  I can't give it a thumbs down, because it is well done for what it is, but it isn't for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031063521', 'num_games_owned': 1754, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1490269070}
review: After about minute in the game I realized there was no one else online to play with. So I decide to give the tutorial try, which proved very helpful since I had previously play the game with a friend when the game was in early access. I learned about how the oxygen works in the game with battling enemies and collecting resources for continuing the game. The game has a learning curvy similar to C&C with the combat system. I'm old school fan of C&C. So I would recommend this game to my friends to play for couple hours at a time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006724053', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1490216492}
review: An interesting game with an unique mechanic(oxygen) which keeps you all the time on pressure.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960331076', 'num_games_owned': 3922, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1490363605}
review: Subsiege is an interesting take on the RTS genre, sports some unique mechanics (like the oxygen timer and the underground leviathan) with some MOBA elements sprinkled on top. The underwater setting is surprisingly fresh, the gameplay can get very intense! The only problem is that it's hard to find a match sometimes!

author: {'steamid': '76561198017335690', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1764, 'last_played': 1536252387}
review:
[h1]Finally on Steam![/h1]

This game has come a long way and I'm really happy to see it in early access now.
It's stunning to see the improvements in compare to earlier versions and I'm positively surprised about the level of detail and polish the game has.
I just runned a few matches and still enjoy the [b]catchy mechanics[/b], that always feel to me like a mixture of something you liked from the past and something modern, that gives you a [b]fresh mark[/b] about this whole genre.

You can basically expect some neat combination of a classic [b]MOBA/RTS[/b] game, but with a [b]highly intensified, hardcore multiplayer competition[/b]. Meaning [b]short, strained rounds[/b] of collecting, combat and organizing the rare ressources everyone tries to claim for themself. Those also require you to be much [b]more tactical[/b] about your focus than other games usually need you to.
The interessting thing about this is the constant pressure you have to bear while choosing the right investments on your units, their skills and your squad's expeditions to ressources or enemy attack lines WITHOUT the hostile underwater life literally eating you up.

In my opinion this is exactly what makes this game so [b]unique to play[/b].
Also I just love the [b]setting[/b], there are way to less underwater games out there and the implementation is amazing! The [b]nice grafics[/b] and the [b]atmospheric sounds[/b] are doing their job here.

Maybe last to say: Though still in early access [i]Subsiege[/i] runs nice and smooth on my pc and I havn't encountered any weird bugs (yet). However I will definitly keep my eyes open on any further updates and how the game evolves in the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970557392', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 372, 'last_played': 1489878522}
review: So far so good!

author: {'steamid': '76561197985719035', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1489694904}
review:
Subsiege takes an interesting take on underwater MOBA witch a squad-like gameplay even though you mostly play your squad as if it was one hero. 

The constant loss of oxygen adds the spice to this arena game. Players can't hide and the encounter is around the corner. 
The fighting needs some polish in my view though it's already fun and challenging. You also can improve your units which will give you better options in later game stages. I just have experience from a few battles - so far it's fun for me, I will dive into more. 

It's an eraly stage release but I was positively overwhelmed about the high level of polish in this game. There is lots of potential to grow into the right direction. The basics are already here. 

If you like to see more indie MOBAs definitely give this a try and support these dudes with contiburting to their development.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996013657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 856, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1489597661}
review:
Really happy to see a new RTS game. I like the underwater setting very much. It is very colorful and new against the popular WW2 or space settings. Because I played other RTS games, I got used to the controls real quick and had no problems jumping right into the game.
Having oxygen as a constant resource is an interesting mechanic, which I like. I will be looking closely for any updates.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025492889', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1489190287}
review: A cool mix of RTS and MOBA mecanics in an interessting setting!

author: {'steamid': '76561197978965620', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 399, 'last_played': 1489493412}
review: A quite inventive take on the RTS genre. The atmosphere looks and sounds really dense due to the VFX and ambient sound - it really gives you this kind of weird underwater impression. One major plus is that the controls are very intuitive and the game is easy to pick up, especially when you left during the C&C era and now wan't to get back into RTS games ;) The oxygen feature is one of the things I'm not completly happy with, but I've just started so let's see how this turns out. But for an Early Access Game it's already very satisifing in general, I'm curious what things will come next

author: {'steamid': '76561198080266027', 'num_games_owned': 1209, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1489018016}
review:
Direkt zum Anfang.. FINGER WEG VON DIESEM SPIEL! [spoiler] Zumindest zu diesem Zeitpunkt [/spoiler]
Es gibt simpel KEINE Spieler. In den letzten Tagen waren insgesamt an einem Tag nie mehr als 2-4 Spieler online... auf den Tag verteilt. Einfach nachzulesen auf steamdb.

Ich konnte das Spiel nicht einmal weiter als das Tutorial spielen weil es KEINE Spiele zu finden gab.
Dieses Spiel ist eine Tod Geburt. Die Entwickler haben sich vor "Release" nicht die Mühe gemacht für das Spiel zu werben. und es dann für einen absolut überteurten Preis bei Steam reingestellt.
Wären sie Intelligent hätten Sie das Spiel wenigstens F2P gemacht. 

Zu diesem Zeitpunkt sollte sich niemand das Spiel kaufen, da man es nicht spielen kann.
UPDATE 18.07.2017: Wie bereits in meinem vorangegangen Review von mir erwähnt ist dieses Spiel Tod. Daran hat sich auch bis heute nach 4 Monaten NICHTS geändert. Laut SteamDB hat in den letzten 14 Tagen NIEMAND dieses Spiel gespielt. Ich möchte jeden davor warnen dieses Spiel zu kaufen. Die Entwickler haben scheinbar das Spiel ebenfalls aufgegeben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006338903', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1489441750}
review:
edit: habe es zurückgegeben, konnte gestern abend ein match spielen und das hat gereicht... wer sich diesen fixen zu nahen zoom ausgedacht hat gehört geschlagen, sorry... aber da hat man sowas von keine Übersicht, da hilft die kleine mini-map auch so gut wie garnicht
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ich kaufe das Spiel um ingame festzustellen das es keiner spielt?!?!
auf deutsch gesagt scheisse, ein mmo ohne andere spieler spielt sich nicht so gut bzw garnicht

warte diesen abend noch ab, es ist jetzt 20 vor 19 Uhr... wenn man selbst um die uhrzeit keine Leute findet zum zocken sehe ich schwarz für das game...

@ devs macht mal richtig werbung sonst wird das nix... wäre ich durch zufall nicht auf youtube (oder war es gamestar) darauf gestoßen hätte ich es nicht gefunden

habe ja noch 1.5 stunden übrig bis ich keinen refund mehr beantragen kann... mal schaun ob die zeit reicht ein match zu spielen

btw ich rate von dem game jetzt ab weil es so absolut kein sinn macht wenn es keiner spielt... ich denke aber das es insgesamt ein gutes game ist, nachdem was ich auf YT gesehen habe... wäre nur toll wenn man es selber mal spielen könnte

author: {'steamid': '76561198007179727', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1489333575}
review: Cool and cold (way down in the depths) game. Reminds me a little of the old warhammer series with building units and upgrading them but underwater. More focus on the units than building base. The setting is really different for once. Hope they elaborte on the background story when they move out of Beta. One needs to really play the tutorial to understand how it differs from other comparable games, clearly designed to play it competitively and social functionalites work well. Easy to link up with other players and set up matches. Really like it, but guess will have to invest a few more hours before getting good at it ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198133802891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1489430955}
review:
Also, das Spiel vom GAmeplay her ist super, und macht spaß.
Aber es sind kaum Spieler online für eine kleine Runde am Abend, Sachade!

author: {'steamid': '76561198073657395', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1489105946}
review:
For now I won't recommend this game. And this is not because of the gameplay but because of the lack of players. I bought it and liked it but no one was online I tried litteraly every region. maybe it's because it's new and not well known yet I don't know. 

But if you dont mind playing vs the AI over and over again till the community gets bigger. you might like this mix of RTS meets MOBA.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969359168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1343, 'last_played': 1489225828}
review:
Started playing in the BETA and love the game so far.

It feels a little bit like Starcraft without the base building part. The oxygen depletion is a nice touch to create pressure and adds a new edge to the RTS like gameplay.

Also the switch from Unity to Unreal Engine did push the graphics even further than before. Icebird did a nice job there.

If you like RTS and MOBA like games give it a try :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198007464638', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1489168161}
review: I am following this game for quite some time now and I have to say that it turned out great. I am a long time MOBA player and startet out with LOL. I have been trying a lot of different MOBAs and MOBA likes, but I never stayed for long. Subsiege now has a very fresh and new take on the whole genre and I think i might stay for good :).

author: {'steamid': '76561198025161097', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1489087185}
review: Amazing game with great Esports potential. While the game is still in Early Access, it does not feel like it. Really polished and fun. I would love to see this game can becoming the next DotA.

Fully recommend it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198082657798', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1489075349}
review: Игра не понравилась, не буду рассказывать про плюсы и про минусы, скажу лишь что покупал ее в надежде на то что эта игра будет похожа на старенькие добрые морские титаны, но увы это не так. Запросил возврат средств.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007801757', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1489071695}
review:
Cool underwater feeling. Loved the big Kraken-thing coming from the abyss..

I personally like the hero-style units which you try to keep alive instead of building tons of units.
But I am to bad a player for the fast multiplayer-competition. But if anyone likes me in her team, I will gladly join another fight.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116685352', 'num_games_owned': 867, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1489034482}

author: {'steamid': '76561198358083841', 'num_games_owned': 1968, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1489048118}
review: Хорошая игра. Необычная. Плавать на подводной лодке и воевать с морскими гадами. Отлично.

author: {'steamid': '76561198302422961', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 311, 'last_played': 1489068867}
review: I'm typically not a MOBA player, so the battle mechanics are somewhat challenging for me, but this one caught my attention because of the unique deep sea setting and the pressure (see what I did there?). Combining different ship units is pretty cool and I love catching the enemy outside of his base when he leasts expects it and give his units the heat. Good fun!

author: {'steamid': '76561197978515963', 'num_games_owned': 388, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1489156492}
review:
Nice unspoiled setting and quite unique MOBA mechanic where you build your "hero" by combining different submarines together.
If you are into MOBAs and tired of fantasy everywhere this is your game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198006855437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1489063809}
review:
A neat little game that is fun once you get how to play it. Although you command a fleet of ships the gameplay feels rather MOBA-like. The constant oxygen farming succeeds in keeping the stress-level high, but is also quite overwhelming and unclear for new players.

Generally I can recommend this for MOBA and strategy fans who can deal with losing a few times before understanding how the game works.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970675548', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1489005688}
review:
It's a fun mix between a MOBA and an RTS. Short, intense and action filled matches.
An added twist is the oxygen mechanic, which will force you not to turtle in your base.
Can whole heartedly recommend. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198065957856', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1489057036}
review: Has great potential

author: {'steamid': '76561197970587089', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1489054174}
review:
After just a few hours I am... well... kind of amazed.
Thought to play just another RTS in the beginning, but its getting more and more MOBA like. Really swift and fluid gameplay. Lots of pressure with these O²-tanks always getting low. Bringing your heartbeat in the higher regions.
It is... especially after some 2v2v2 matches... a lot of fun!
How about a 2v2v2v2v2v2v2? ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198254313513', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1489167284}
review: I really enjoyed playing subsiege, spent a great amount of time playing. I feel at the beginning, If you area not familiar with RTS it can be overwhelming. As soon as you grasp the idea, it keeps you going searching for Oxygen, resources and fighting your enemies.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964677220', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 487, 'last_played': 1489159578}
review:
Really nice take on the RTS-genre! The submarine settings hits my taste!
What makes this game stand out is the constant pressure you are under because you not only have to fight your opponents but you also have to keep an eye on your oxygen reserves...was a bit unfamiliar at first but really adds to the fun once you get the hang of it!
Especially because killed opponents drop oxygen, which makes hiding from enemies impossible if you don't want to suffocate! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561197994777980', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1489001443}
review:
Subsiege is a Strategy game that combines fast paced unit management with elements from MOBAS while layering a Oxygen mechanic on top that adds both an additional layer of depth and ensures quick and suspenseful matches.

It offers a variety of matchup options that range from 1v1, 2v2 up to modes that support 12 Players at once.

The Experience is very smooth and apart from a few UI elements which look a little clunky and outdated (some font choices are a bit odd too) The Sound design too doesn't feel entirely finished yet.
However, both the Ship and the Environmental design are gorgeous and really bring out the best of the underwater setting and so far I haven't stumbled over significant balancing issues.

If you're looking for a fast to pick up fun to Play game to start up for some quick play sessions and you want to feel like Captain Nemo waging war I can wholeheartedly recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198341216719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1489074095}
review: A cool tactic game with a really nice underwater atmosphere. The pressure of searching for oxygen, even during plenty of battles, gives the game an additional edge. You should definitely give it a go.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158369544', 'num_games_owned': 335, 'num_reviews': 278, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1489050282}
review: Сойдет время скоротать

author: {'steamid': '76561198126479682', 'num_games_owned': 561, 'num_reviews': 402, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1489061297}
review: New GAme testing

author: {'steamid': '76561198052586368', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1489018830}
review:
Subsiege ist ein interessantes strategie/moba Game und nicht so einfach wie es vielleicht auf den ersten Blick wirkt.
In einer Spielesession versucht man soviele Punkte wie möglich zu machen, dies wird nicht nur dadurch Limitiert, wie lange man überlebt, sondern auch wieviel Sauerstoff man hat. Den bekommt man von Monstern oder gegnerischen Mitspielern. Man ist so immer angehalten aktiv zu bleiben. So nichts für Bunkererer aber sehr für aktive Spieler zu empfehlen. Richtig lustig wird es bei sehr vielen Spielern auf dem Feld.

Gefällt mir bisher sehr gut. Für ein Early Acsess hat es schon viele Features und das Basisspiel läuft gut und flüssig. Zudem ist es eine junge Deutsche Firma. Cool, wenn man mal hier jemanden "vor Ort" unterstützen kann. Die Grafiken sind bombastisch und der Sound sowie die Voicerecords sind sehr liebevoll und gut gemacht.
Bisher bin ich noch ein ziemlicher "Noob" was die Upgrades der einzelnen Schiffe angeht. Aber sie sind mit skills von Dota oder League of Legends bekannt und können richtig eingesetzt das Spiel nocheinmal wenden.

Wer Strategie und Moba mag, sollte Subsiege devinitv mal einen Versuch geben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047953648', 'num_games_owned': 434, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 489, 'last_played': 1489155072}
review: I've been following this game for quite a while and was able to participate in an early play event this February. I'm usually not a huge fan of competitive multiplayer games, but the setting, the quick matches and most of all the ability to really customize my squad got me hooked. Looking forward to spending a lot more time with the game now that it's on Early Access!

author: {'steamid': '76561198015276558', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1489230433}
review: Played a few quick rounds, had a lot of fun. Teamplay is key in this game, i really like the 2v2v2 modes. Quite challanging at the beginning, but with a good teammate helping you out with some extra credits to buy new ships it gets better every round. Together you can surround your enemies in the narrow pathways and decimate their fleet easily. Beware of the creatures in the deep sea, they can easily destroy your ships if your not carefule while leaping over the canyon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029340163', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 529, 'last_played': 1489042502}
review:
nice game, played just a few rounds until now but it does remind me of the intensity of Dota. 
If you like action and a challenging game - this could be just right for you. 

It's a little confusing at the beginning, but after a few rounds and after getting to know the units better it started to make real fun!

I will test it further and update.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073558863', 'num_games_owned': 415, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 220, 'last_played': 1489100054}
review:
Le tenia muchas ganas por que me recordaba mucho a Submarine Titans, y me ha acabado decepcionando bastante, 
En fin, sus problemas son los problemas tipicos de un Early access, pero los tiene, y son fallos MUY GRAVES

Para comenzar, no hay jugadores, siendo un Moba/estrategia, la parte online es practicamente todo, y en este caso es inexistente

Ahora bien, mecanicamente tampoco es nada del otro mundo, es bastante agobiante y frustrante, segun creo, que a proposito, ya que el mismo eslogan del juego es "Podrás soportar la presion?", pero es verdaderamente muy injusto, el oxigeno se acaba en un momento, y segun va avanzando la partida se gasta cada vez mas rapido, , es una buena forma de meter presion, el problema, es que llegas a un momento, en el que tienes 2 minutos para Farmear, hacer unidades, y con lo que te sobre, intentar matar a los equipos contrarios, 

Así que acabas, (En el entrenamiento, ya que como he dicho no hay jugadores) sin poder hacer nada por que tardas mas en matar a los piratas intentando farmear oxigeno, que no hacerlo, pero sin el, mueresTeniendo en cada muerte, menos y menos tiempo, y acabando en un ciclo de desesperacion, MUY MUY agobiante y estresante


Sobre el rendimiento, francamente horrible, Jugando a 1080p en medio, con una GTX 960 y un FX 8320, a penas es capaz de moverlo a 40fps, usando el 99% de mi GPU, teniendo en cuenta como se ve, veo, que hay muuuuuucho aun donde pulir, usando afterburner para limitarlo a 30fps es mas o menos jugable, pero esto no es algo que deberia tener que hacer

Hay bastaaaantes bugs, en las escasas 2 horas de juego que le he dado, me he encontrado con el en el mismo tutorial se queda bugueado y no puedes avanzar, que los menus y el texto no casan, varios indicadores que unas veces aparecen en su sitio, y otras veces aparecen a 20 metros de las naves, en fin, bastante "Early access" aun, 


Necesita pulido en temas de interfaz, que sea mas limpia y mas simple, ya que dependiendo de la resolucion, tienes demasiado trozo de menú, sin ser realmente necesario, ya que todo es demasiado grande, y poca pantalla, tampoco puedes alejar demasiado la camara


El resumen, Muy verde, Tengo interes de verlo en unos meses, pero AUN, le falta pulir muchas cosas

author: {'steamid': '76561197986742635', 'num_games_owned': 1109, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1489005669}
review: I don't really like MOBAs or multiplayer games in general, but this is actually fun. A little less so if you suck at the game and run out of oxygen every 5 minutes like yours truly, but hey, still fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027874670', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 804, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 548, 'last_played': 1489252868}
review:
I played it in Beta already shortly and played it again now as well! Astonishing how fast the game progressed! It got even better still! It is really my kind of game,
I love MOBAs (LoL, DOTA, HOTS, Smite) and the fact that you can basically "create" your hero by assembling your small fleet the way you want, that's just brilliant. Allows for so much customization! Looking forward to the game growing further and developing a big online community!

author: {'steamid': '76561197971392229', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 788, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 788, 'last_played': 1489164583}
review: Looks so far great and plays smooth. I like it and will spend more time with it. A fresh take for the MOBA genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987529898', 'num_games_owned': 16, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 664, 'last_played': 1541080153}
review: Really nice game. The setting is quite creative, underwater, have never seen this in a game before. Some parts are similar to games like LOL and DOTA, but the oxygen pressure is a new component. I also like the 2v2v2v... games, is a lot of fun with so many players. I really can recommend it and hope some new maps will come out soon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018583295', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1516383609}
review:
A fast, straregic submarine multiplayer game with short game sessions. An open map, lots of units and upgrades and constant pressure to find enough oxygen to keep going. 
Very Interesting!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007465639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1489933928}

yes! yes! yes!

author: {'steamid': '76561198127465502', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1489055205}
review:
Сложная игра.
Минусы:
1. Я не смог пройти обучение т.к. не было кнопки: "Измерить пульс/импульс".
2.В игре вроде бы нельзя одному нельзя, только в 2, 4 и тд.
3. Когда меняешь настройки графики на минимум или средние, то он через 5 попыток меняет. А если видео изменить после изменения графики, то графика ставится на ультра, а на ультра игра у меня лагает.(Просто супер мощный пк(нет))
Плюсы:
1. Есть русский язык
2. Я каким-то образом получил ключ на закрытую(а может быть и не на закрытую) бета-версию игры.
3. Можно пропустить обучение
Вывод: Выбор делайте сами.
